title: About Peer de Bakker
whoami: I'm a Senior Software Engineer passionate about Cybersecurity and AI.
p1: My tech journey started at Codam Amsterdam (42 Network), where I wrote my first lines of code in C. After finishing the core curriculum, I interned and worked at Panartis, building backend systems for art collection databases. I then pursued my Master's at 42 Paris, specializing in AI and Cybersecurity.
p2: Now I'm a Software Engineer and Data Engineer at Auguria.io, where I build data clustering pipelines in Go, Python, and Rust that process billions of records to enable anomaly detection. I manage Kubernetes deployments for tens of microservices, administer PostgreSQL databases, and maintain CI/CD pipelines and AWS infrastructure.
